summary: The implementation successfully addresses all 10 requirements for converting the eagle logo to a circular design with animations and removing the email from the header. All logo styling, animation sequences, responsive design, performance optimization, email removal, and header realignment requirements are implemented in the modified files.

hallucinated_features.description: Session storage tracking for animation state ('eagle-logo-animated' key)
hallucinated_features.reason: The implementation includes sessionStorage.getItem/setItem to ensure the animation plays only once per session. This persistent state management was not requested in any requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Hover scale effect on eagle image (scale-105 class)
hallucinated_features.reason: The eagle image itself has a scale transform on hover that was not part of the requested features. Requirements only mentioned hover effects on the circular container and glow.

The implementation includes willChange property that dynamically changes based on animation state. While performance optimization was requested (REQ-6), this specific CSS optimization technique was not mentioned.
